title: Haircut Cleaning Brush - Professional Barber Neck Dust Collector - Soft Hair Cleaning Brush - Salon Hairdressing Tools, Barber Accessories
features: NON-SLIP DESIGN: Our hair cleaning brush handle design, easy to hold, non-slip design, inlaid metal ring, not easy to fall off, easy to operate, comfortable to touch, durable.
QUALITY: Our professional hairdressing brush is made of high-quality materials, comfortable and soft, easy to clean, and can be used for a long time, perfect for all hairdressers and hair stylists.
VERSATILE: Our cleaning brush can be used not only as a tool for hairdressers to help remove dust and hair. It can also be used as a normal brush to clean dust or tiny dirt on the table.
PERFECT CLEANING: Our high quality neck dusters are specially designed so that the soft and dense bristles are not irritating to the skin. And you can easily reach every place for final cleaning.
